item.title: A non-abelian tensor product of algebras with bracket
item.description: arXiv:2407.09158v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We introduce and study a non-abelian tensor product of two algebras with bracket with compatible actions on each other. We investigate its applications to the universal central extensions and the low-dimensional homology of perfect algebras with bracket.
item.dc:creator: Jos\'e Manuel Casas, Emzar Khmaladze, Manuel Ladra
